Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: The only trail open today is Buck's Run (and the connector). Great skate deck, deep classic tracks. It was probably too windy to groom (or ski) the golf course, but I wish they'd groom Cedar Trace and the Contractors Loop.

Stoney Creek Metropark (Shelby Township).conditions: Plenty of snow in woods and on golf course, woods was nicer, less wind. Trail was soft, easy climbing but not much speed on downhills. Only classic tracks were skier produced; it would be nice if the foot traffic would stop walking in the ski tracks.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs has an 18 inch groomed in hardpack  base . Today a fresh groom of new snow made for hero skiing . It was cold : but LF 6 made it work . And the wind was light . Excellent !

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be power-tilled and tracked again this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: LAKE EFFECT! The forecast for last night was wrong and that is a beautiful thing. Five soft inches of champagne snow sits on top of corduroy on the steeps this morning. There is also powder lines left on much of Pintail Peak. The beginner terrain and some of the intermediate runs are being groomed a second time this morning. Pintail Peak lodge is open with food service and an espresso bar. The soup of the day is cheesy cauliflower and ham or tomato soup if you prefer the more traditional. If you can make it out to ski today you should. Grab the wide boards and make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
